alert.note: Alert for Grimes; Madison; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:10PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Grimes, southeastern Madison and west central Walker Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 210 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Madisonville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Huntsville and Crabbs Prairie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
